elements.name: header
elements.html:
Code.org AI 101 Self-paced Online Professional Learning for Educators

Welcome to the program!

Code.org relies on surveys as a crucial tool through which we remain connected to teachers, and to give you the opportunity to provide feedback about our curriculum and your teaching experience, as well as to improve our programs.

Privacy and Confidentiality

  • Your individual responses here are completely confidential.
  • Your identity will never be revealed publicly or used to tie any responses back to you personally.
  • We may share anonymous, aggregate data (representing all responses) publicly.
  • Your anonymized responses will be used by Code.org and our Regional Partners for program improvement.

Your honesty and candor are appreciated.

AI 101 For Educators: Post-Module Survey

elements.name: confidence_use_ai
elements.title: After completing this module, do you feel more or less confident than before about using AI in your school or classroom?

elements.name: content_relevant_role
elements.title: Was the content of the module relevant to your role?

elements.name: nps_self_paced_pd_ai_101
elements.title: How likely are you to recommend the AI 101 Self-Paced Professional Learning experience to other educators?

elements.name: plan_use_content_learned
elements.title: Are you planning to use what you learned in this module in your role as an educator?

choices.text: Yes, I already did
Yes, I plan to use what I learned
No, I didn’t find it relevant to my classroom/role

elements.name: selfpaced_pd_ai_101_barriers_implementation
elements.title: What are the main barriers to using what you’ve learned?

choices.text: None
It is not clear to me how to apply what I’ve learned
AI use has been discouraged in my school/district
I need to learn more about AI before using it in my classroom/role
I need more practice on my own before using it in my classroom/role
My school restricts access to AI tools
My school doesn't have clear guidance or policies around using and teaching about AI
Other

elements.name: how_long_to_complete
elements.title: How long did it take you to complete this professional learning experience?

choices.text: Fewer than 30 minutes
Between 30 minutes and 60 minutes
Between 60 minutes and 90 minutes
Between 90 minutes and 120 minutes
Over 120 minutes

elements.name: other_feedback
elements.title: Do you have any feedback about this module that you would like to share with the Code.org team?

elements.name: permission_to_quote
elements.title: I give Code.org permission to quote my written comments from this survey for use on social media, promotional materials, and other communications.

choices.text: Yes, I give the workshop organizer permission to quote me and use my name.
Yes, I give the workshop organizer permission to quote me, but I want to be anonymous.
No, I do not give the workshop organizer my permission.

elements.name: participate_focus_group
elements.title: OPTIONAL: Would you be willing to participate in a follow-up discussion to provide direct feedback about this online course?

choices.text: Yes
No

elements.name: email_focus_group
elements.title: Great! Please share an email address where we may contact you.

elements.name: thank_you
elements.html:
Thank You!

Thanks from Code.org for your time, thoughts, and passion for teaching.
